title: Weakening Strike
content:
Weakening Strike

Weakening Strike can be unlocked by the following types of Weapons

Rapiers War Picks Most Warhammers: Intransigent Warhammer Faithbreaker Warhammer +1 Warhammer +2

Intransigent Warhammer Faithbreaker Warhammer +1 Warhammer +2

Weakening Strike Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here

All Actions in Baldur's Gate 3 Aberrant Shape ♦ Abjure Enemy ♦ Absolute Power ♦ Absorb Elements (Reaction) ♦ Absorb Intellect ♦ Action Surge ♦ Arcane Recovery ♦ Aspect of the Elk ♦ Aspect of the Wolf
